functions.name: startResizingBrowserTabsTo
functions.description: Resizes gBrowser for each newly created tab.

functions.name: makeTabFullHeight
functions.description: Resizes a tab up to the full height of the page loaded in it.

parameters.name: tabLabelId
parameters.description: Label/title assigned to a tab -- should be assigned as a page title before manipulation

functions.name: stopResizingBrowserTabsTo
functions.description: Stop resizing new global tabs/windows to our larger-than-screen sizes
